column1: fantastic card huge upgrade from my old 1080 fits my itx nzxt h1 v2 perfectly

excellent card it came without delays the only detail that whistles a little when the fans were at maximum i dont know if its a factory detail or that noise is normal for everything else great performance it was right in my assembly
fast shipping the package arrived in perfect condition as for the gpu very good performance it exceeded my expectations

it arrived in perfect condition from the usa to mexico working perfectly i just dont like the theme of the adapter that comes with it so i bought an msi pcie 5 power supply and it was connected directly to the source with the 600 watt cable without extra adapters
one of the best purchase for me i like everything about this card

it fit in my nzxt h11 mini itx build and i could overclock it though havent yet due to me not having bought a 1440p monitor yet so im bottlenecked by my cpu atm but it handles tarkov well enough and cheaper than a new 3090 on amazon
big improvement over the 3070ti plenty of vram runs everything i play at 4k on ultra settings
ordered for grandson he says it s the best
upgraded from rtx 2070 and all i can say is awesome
great for 4k 60 fps in most games
card is a bit on the pricey side but it s a good card for ray tracing and gaming at 1440p resolution over 60 fps
the gpu comes with a adjustable support brace
it works great i have no problem with my ryzen r7 7700 i use it for 1440p and recommend it

a high cost apparently maybe not after writing this review but it was when i purchased mine been running everything i throw at it greatly came from a 2070 and ai workloads gaming have increased performance at least by a factor of 3
play video
excellent choice but the price is very expensive

i ordered it came as expected everything in the box and 1 week laster the power connector cables started to burn i took it out and they were black and burned so i sent it back not buying from this manufacturer againbutwhen it did work it ran everything at top level except for cyberpunk ps buy either a 1000w or 1300w power supply for this thing

card works perfectly well works well under stress and not a sound and games run over hundred frames per second with 1440p i don t know what s the hate behind it but it s affordable for 850 comes overclocked and has the firestorm software because of zotac that monitors cards and updates you can t ask for more than that

i am a media creator and need the fastest possible card this card replace my stand by amd 5700xt i can already tell that this card is way faster and can run programs that my previous card could not run i am about to do a large project with it that would really taxed it
exelente
while the box is very nice everything in the box was missing packing material was the only thing in the box i thought something was afoot when i noticed the factory seal was broken
